title: 113_hr423
content: There are no relevant paragraphs provided in the prev_chunk to assist with summarizing the curr_chunk. Section 8335a of Title 5, United States Code, states that Members of Congress will no longer be covered by retirement benefits under this subchapter, effective immediately. No further contributions or deductions will be made for these Members. This does not affect any rights or benefits accrued prior to this change. Members of Congress are no longer covered by retirement benefits under Title 5, United States Code. This change does not affect their eligibility to participate in the Thrift Savings Plan. Regulations for this section may be prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management or the Executive Director for matters related to the Thrift Savings Plan. Refunds may be issued to Members affected by this change. The lump-sum credit shall be payable to Members as if they satisfied specific sections of the code. The term 'Member' excludes the Vice President. A clerical amendment is made to the table of sections in chapter 83 of Title 5, United States Code. Termination of further retirement coverage for Members of Congress and amendments related to the Federal Employees' Retirement System. Termination of further retirement coverage for Members of Congress by amending Subchapter II of chapter 84 of title 5, United States Code. Members who first joined before the enactment date will no longer be subject to this chapter, with no more Government contributions or deductions from basic pay. Members who first joined before the enactment date will no longer be subject to retirement coverage, with no Government contributions or deductions from basic pay. This does not affect any prior rights, entitlements, or benefits under this chapter. The regulations for the Thrift Savings Plan may be prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management or the Executive Director. Lump-sum credit shall be payable to a Member as if they were still covered by retirement benefits. The regulations for the Thrift Savings Plan may be prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management or the Executive Director. A Member is entitled to benefits as if they satisfied specific criteria. The term 'Member' excludes the Vice President. Termination of retirement coverage for Members of Congress.
